original_title: Rock Milestones: The Clash's London Calling
overview: Critical review of the English punk rock band's 1979 album, 'London Calling'. The program features input from industry experts, including film director and DJ Don Letts, rare performance footage and clips from songs such as 'Should I Stay Or Should I Go', 'White Riot' and 'London Calling'.
title: Rock Milestones: The Clash's London Calling
